biotools.summary: 16S subunit related sequences database, identified from metagenomic efforts as part of the Tara Oceans project. It includes a BLAST search tool. The analysis system incorporates the SILVA collection, allowing comparative analyses to identify unclassified sequences and their geographical distribution.

bioschemas.name: GLOSSary
